channel.title: DRAGNUM on DRAGNUM Dragon Boat Calgary
channel.description: Recent content in DRAGNUM on DRAGNUM Dragon Boat Calgary

item.title: About
item.description: DRAGNUM is a mixed team, comprised of a core who have been paddling together for more than a decade, plus awesome new recruits each season. We are a fitness oriented group and our goal is to place at or near the top of every festival we enter. We also often race the women’s division at festivals by joining forces with other teams. We practice twice a week and compete in 3-4 festivals in a typical year.

item.title: Meet the coach!
item.description: Dragnum is lucky have a coach who has raced on Canada’s National dragon boat team! Most recently, he earned a spot on the 2017 team, which was in Kunming, China in October. He came home from China with a bronze, 3 silver, and 4 gold medals! At the World’s in Hungary in 2013, Shane’s Canada crew won 3 gold and 1 bronze medal, and at the 2015 World’s in Welland, they came away with gold in all four categories.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Interested in joining? Send us a message and we’ll be in touch! Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
